original_title: Perquè ningú no oblidi el teu nom
overview: Rosa is a young teacher who started the course in a school in the outskirts of Valencia. There he meets a troubled student, who at first did not know how to handle, and with James, the director of the school, a disillusioned man.  One of the students called Rosa's attention immediately. Amira is a Sudanese girl who is not related to the other fellow.  These include establishing a good relationship, and that makes Rosa discover that the family intends to practice Amira an ablation. Rosa will try to avoid it.
title: Perquè ningú no oblidi el teu nom
